name: Beadel the Carpenter
description:
Beadel worked at a job until he lost it due to the mandated shut-down. Can a friendly bug help him replace his income?

Eat the wood following the pattern. Get as much as you can within the time limit!

Troubleshooting

Make sure to click at least once in the game itself, so that it will start capturing input.

This game was made for the Side Quest # 1. The theme was House Spyder.

Feedback

If you'd like to give feedback, I would greatly appreciate it. Things that are new for me on this game would be animation, sound effects, and music composition.
